meanings.definition: A person who is a doctor or physician.
meanings.sent1: The doc helped me feel better when I was sick.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with the doc next week.
meanings.sent3: The doc told a funny joke during my check-up.
meanings.sent4: The doc's stethoscope was like a magic wand, diagnosing ailments.
meanings.sent5: The doc's white coat made them look very professional.

meanings.definition: A document or file containing information or instructions.
meanings.sent1: I need to print out the doc for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: Please send me the doc via email.
meanings.sent3: The missing doc turned out to be under a pile of papers.
meanings.sent4: The doc was a treasure map leading to hidden knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The doc had all the answers neatly organized.

meanings.definition: To provide medical care or treatment.
meanings.sent1: The nurse will doc your wound before bandaging it.
meanings.sent2: Doctors doc patients with care and expertise.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally tried to doc my friend's stuffed animal.
meanings.sent4: Her soothing words doced his worries like a healing balm.
meanings.sent5: The medicine will doc your symptoms in no time.
